summary: Integrate the website contact form so submitted details are sent/read via WhatsApp numbers provided by the user.

existing_features.title: Update the contact form success flow so that the WhatsApp message prefill (containing the submitted contact-form details) is sent to WhatsApp number +919181768591 instead of using the site’s default WhatsApp number.

Keep the website’s general WhatsApp integration pointing to +919182768591 for standard “Chat on WhatsApp” buttons/links (header/footer/contact info), while still allowing the contact-form-details WhatsApp CTA to target +919181768591.
Centralize both WhatsApp numbers in frontend configuration so they are not hard-coded in page components, and use English labels for any user-facing text related to WhatsApp CTAs.

new_feature_requests.summary: Integrate contact form submissions with WhatsApp so the entered details are delivered to/accessible via WhatsApp (numbers: +919181768591 and +919182768591).

projectName: Send contact form details to WhatsApp (+919181768591) and keep site WhatsApp chat (+919182768591)
